trans-unit.target: TEXT_JOBMCH299_02109_STEPHANIVIEN_000_000<tab>Hmmm, my prospectometer seems rather fond of you. Let's see, shall we...? Odd garb. Striking presence. Would I be right in assuming that you are one of those adventurous types?

TEXT_JOBMCH299_02109_STEPHANIVIEN_000_001<tab>Hmmm, my prospectometer seems rather fond of you. Let's see, shall we...? Odd garb. Striking presence. Would I be right in assuming that you are the outsider who helped save Ishgard?
TEXT_JOBMCH299_02109_STEPHANIVIEN_000_002<tab>Ah, I thought as much! My prospectometer seldom lies! And let me just say, you have made the right choice in visiting our humble workshop.
TEXT_JOBMCH299_02109_STEPHANIVIEN_000_003<tab>Ahem. Welcome to the Skysteel Manufactory, where miracles are born from aether, metal, and imagination!

TEXT_JOBMCH299_02109_STEPHANIVIEN_000_004<tab>From cannons to ballistas, we develop and manufacture a range of weapons designed for slaying dragon invaders. ...But we are also accepting students who wish to take up a firearm and learn the techniques of the machinist!
TEXT_JOBMCH299_02109_STEPHANIVIEN_000_005<tab>What say you? Are you interested in joining us, and exploring the machinist discipline?
TEXT_JOBMCH299_02109_Q1_000_000<tab>Are you interested in exploring the machinist discipline?
TEXT_JOBMCH299_02109_STEPHANIVIEN_000_010<tab>You are? Well, of course you are! Otherwise my prospectometer would not have registered your obvious interest!
TEXT_JOBMCH299_02109_STEPHANIVIEN_000_011<tab>Ah. In my excitement, I've neglected to introduce myself. The name's Stephanivien. Stephanivien de Haillenarte. And you are...?

TEXT_JOBMCH299_02109_STEPHANIVIEN_000_015<tab>You... No? How odd. I was certain my prospectometer had detected a high level of interest. Come now, you needn't be shy! I shall be here should you surrender to what is obviously your heart's desire!
